xmlObject.TargetConfigs:
<targetConfig targets="lightningCommunity__Default">
      <property name="recordId" type="String"></property>
      <property name="objectApiName" type="String"></property>
    </targetConfig>
    <targetConfig targets="lightning__AppPage">
      <property name="debug" type="Boolean"></property>
      <property name="recordId" type="String"></property>
    </targetConfig>
    <targetConfig targets="lightning__RecordPage">
      <property name="debug" type="Boolean"></property>

        <supportedFormFactor type="Small"></supportedFormFactor>
      </supportedFormFactors>
    </targetConfig>
